name: Don't Lose Hope [RMGDA 2019 Game Jam]
description:
Game made for the Rocky Mountain Game Developers Association 2019 Game Jam

NOTE: This game requires a game controller

*WebGL Build is experimental

How To Play:

  • Find Hope the Dog before time runs out.
  • Use the Candy Corn located in front of houses to find Hope.
  • Your mini map in the top right corner shows Candy Corn locations.
  • Press A when you are near Hope and tap A while struggling with Hope (struggle bar will appear on the screen)
  • Be careful when approaching Hope. Listen for music changes to know if Hope is nearby.
